com.vdisk.utils

类 Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vdisk.utils.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Config() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static String getDebugLogPath()
      Returns the debug log path.
      static int getUploadResponseTimeout()
      Get the upload response timeout.
      static int getUploadSocketTimeout()
      Get the upload socket timeout.
      static boolean isDebugMode()
      Returns whether sdk is debug mode or not.
      static boolean isHttpsUpload()
      Return whether use https or http for upload.
      static void setDebugLogPath(String path)
      Set the debug log path manually, default path is "sdcard/vdisk/api.log".
      static void setDebugMode(boolean debugMode)
      If DEBUG_MODE == true, every api request information will be wrote to local file (default path is "sdcard/vdisk/api.log"), else, we won't write to the local file.
      static void setHttpsUpload(boolean needHttps)
      If needHttps = true, use https to upload a file in the api of "/files_put/"
      static void setUploadResponseTimeout(int s)
      Set the upload response timeout.
      static void setUploadSocketTimeout(int ms)
      Set the upload socket timeout in millisecond.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • setDebugMode

        public static void setDebugMode(boolean debugMode)
        If DEBUG_MODE == true, every api request information will be wrote to local file (default path is "sdcard/vdisk/api.log"), else, we won't write to the local file.

      • isDebugMode

        public static boolean isDebugMode()
        Returns whether sdk is debug mode or not.
        返回:

      • setDebugLogPath

        public static void setDebugLogPath(String path)
        Set the debug log path manually, default path is "sdcard/vdisk/api.log".
        参数:
        path -

      • getDebugLogPath

        public static String getDebugLogPath()
        Returns the debug log path.
        返回:

      • setHttpsUpload

        public static void setHttpsUpload(boolean needHttps)
        If needHttps = true, use https to upload a file in the api of "/files_put/"
        参数:
        needHttps -

      • isHttpsUpload

        public static boolean isHttpsUpload()
        Return whether use https or http for upload.
        返回:

      • setUploadSocketTimeout

        public static void setUploadSocketTimeout(int ms)
        Set the upload socket timeout in millisecond. Default is 1 minute.
        参数:
        ms -

      • getUploadSocketTimeout

        public static int getUploadSocketTimeout()
        Get the upload socket timeout.
        返回:

      • setUploadResponseTimeout

        public static void setUploadResponseTimeout(int s)
        Set the upload response timeout. Default is 20 seconds.
        参数:
        s -

      • getUploadResponseTimeout

        public static int getUploadResponseTimeout()
        Get the upload response timeout.
        返回:
